def count_consonants(s):
    return len({c for c in s.lower() if c in 'bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz'})
count_consonants=lambda s: len(set(l for l in s.lower() if l in "bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz"))

def count_consonants(text):
    return len({ch for ch in text.lower() if ch in 'bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz'})

def count_consonants(text):
    return len(set(c for c in text.lower() if c in "bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxxyz"))

def count_consonants(s):
    return len(set(c for c in s.lower() if c in "bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz"))
